footer.summary: NFT ファンダメンタリストのコミュニティ

feature.simple-description: Based on fan economy, tokyo.cards trading card NFT series is one of the best digital utility for community running.
feature.interactive-description: Trade, mint, exchange or decomposing trading cards with other players in the community.
feature.trustless-description: Built on blockchain, our trading card system runs autonomously without the need to trust and third party platform.

service.header-description: Find the right person in the community to exchange, trade or craft new collectables.
